main event: A civilian in Pendleton, Oregon, reported a brief sighting of a saucer-shaped object, approximately one foot in diameter, white in color, moving north at a high speed before disappearing in 1-2 seconds.
interesting points: The observation lasted only 1-2 seconds, making it difficult to gather comprehensive data.
The object was described as saucer-shaped and approximately one foot in diameter.
It was initially observed overhead before disappearing to the north at a high speed.
The document suggests a possibility of the object being astronomical in nature due to the brevity of the sighting.
The source of the report is listed as a civilian.
sighted object: Saucer-shaped object, approximately one foot in diameter, white in color
